attributes.action: scrap recently imposed anti-photography laws as they are a needless infringement of human rights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The police right to stop, search, confiscate equipment, detain and prosecute citizens for photographing property and police serves no practical use.
It hides police from public accountability.
It antagonises the public.
It presents the nation as a police state.
It is open to abuse.

I expect this to be rejected as always.
